title: GitHub
description: “The State of the Octoverse,” an annual report highlighting open source trends and key metrics for the world’s largest developer platform.

title: The Trace
description: An independent, nonpartisan, nonprofit newsroom dedicated to shining a light on America’s gun violence crisis.

title: PBS NewsHour
description: Election night graphics for the 2018 midterms, showing the shifting balance of congressional power in real time.

title: Christopher Kimball’s Milk Street
description: The lastest culinary media project from the founder of Cook’s Illustrated and America’s Test Kitchen.

title: Contemporary Art Museum St. Louis
description: A custom WordPress site for a dynamic and innovative arts center, built in collaboration with Zak Greene and Dome Collective.

title: Punch
description: Cocktail recipes. Travel guides. Long-form essays about drink culture and history. Basically, The New Yorker of the beverage world.

title: WBUR
description: Boston’s largest NPR station and a producer of some of the country’s most iconic public radio shows.

title: Taste
description: A playful new home for food essays, recipes, and kitchen inspiration from Penguin Random House, the world’s largest publisher of cookbooks.

title: Center for Curatorial Leadership
description: A transformative training program for curators of many of the world’s great museums, from the Guggenheim to the Louvre.

title: Strada
description: A cross-disciplinary firm that blends architecture, interior design, and landscape architecture, creating the most innovative spaces in Pittsburgh and Philadelphia.
